title: Two pills one choice
body:
https://npercoco.typepad.com/.a/6a0133f264aa62970b01b7c6cb214e970b-pi

The Red pill changes the gravity of your body unconsciously doubling your jumping power and making your landings softer

The Blue pill reduces the cost of walking/running by 50%  and it increases the healing power of sleep by 25%

**Which pill would u eat and why? **
mehehehehe
